channel.title: Engineering the Software
channel.description: Recent content on Engineering the Software

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: This is my attempt to start blogging again!

About me Derek Parker is a Senior Software Engineer at Red Hat (previously CoreOS, Hashrocket) and the creator of the Delve debugger for Go. He is an active open source maintainer, contributor, speaker, and a longstanding member of the Go community.

Conference talks Debuggers & eBPF: Bringing Debugging to Production Deterministic Debugging With Delve Hands on Debugging With Delve Advanced Debugging With Delve GopherCon 2016 lightening talk Debugging Go Programs With Delve Delve Into go
